response.overview: Hosts Amanda Bearse and Ted McGinley from the set of “Married with Children” pay tribute to some of the best loved Christmas-themed sitcom episodes, specials and variety programs. Clips include "All in the Family," "The Brady Bunch," "Frasier," "Cheers," "The Smothers Brothers," "Rudolph: The Red-Nosed Reindeer," "Frosty the Snowman," "The Grinch That Stole Christmas" and many more!
response.title: TV's All-Time Funniest Christmas Moments

titles.title: Ho! Ho! Ho! TV's All-Time Funniest Christmas Moments
